thread.title: Find out why Ronda Rousey is no longer a Belieber - Swim Daily
thread.title_full: Find out why Ronda Rousey is no longer a Belieber - Swim Daily - SI.com

author: Kelsey Hendrix
title: Find out why Ronda Rousey is no longer a Belieber - Swim Daily
text:
by Kelsey Hendrix Posted: Thu Oct. 8, 2015 Another day, another piece of Ronda Rousey news!
Find it hard to believe that Ronda was ever a fan of teen heartthrob Justin Bieber? Us, too. But like so many others—we're looking at you, Selena Gomez—Ronda has seen the Bieber's true ways and is no longer a Belieber.
• 50 Seconds and a Kiss with UFC Champ Ronda Rousey
During a recent interview with Cosmopolitan , Ronda revealed that Justin's manners could use a little work and pointed to an encounter in Cannes that left a bitter taste of the singer in her mouth. Turns out that while at a party during the Cannes Film Festival, Ronda saw Justin taking photos with fans and the UFC fighter decided to go ask the singer to take one more with her little sister (who was a huge fan).
Ronda explains that she didn't get the response she was hoping for, when Justin said," I've already taken a billion pictures today, okay?". Come on Biebs...even you should know better than to disrespect the world's strongest and fiercest woman.
What's worse? In the process of snubbing Ronda's little sister, Justin lost not one, but two very important fans.
• Join our $2,000,000 Week 5 fantasy football league. First place wins $150,000 this week! Sponsored by FanDuel
With how strongly Ronda feels about Floyd Mayweather, we can't say we're really all that surprised that she's not a fan of one of the most prominent members of his posse. All we know now is that just like Ronda, "Yeah, [we] don't think [we'd] want to hang out with him," either.
BONUS: See some of Ronda's best moments from SI Swimsuit 2015!
